body:
Comment 4: 
I am not sure what is going on. On both the playground and at tip, I get

$ go build x.go
# command-line-arguments
./x.go:6: bar redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at ./x.go:5
./x.go:9: foo.meh redeclared in this block
	previous declaration at ./x.go:8
$

Maybe someone removed the @"" stuff since your reply.
Still fixed.
